category.name: PSM
category.category_description: No description available for this category.

preference.name: Internal_VariantRuleConfiguration_MultipleOptionValueSupport
preference.preference_description: Holds the list of rich client applications that support multiple values for a variant option during variant rule configuration. Valid Values: rich client application IDs. An application ID can be found in an application's plugin.xml under the extension point com.teamcenter.rac.aifrcp.perspectiveDefs. Look for the property value of legacyAppId under the perspective definition. The values are set by Teamcenter development and should not be altered by customers.
